nodes.text: Oh, it's not my place to deal with the traders. Talk to Mynoc, the guardian of the great bridge. He sees them all.
A kindly member of your village.
Hello! I hear you are the Chosen One. Now, perhaps, our village can be saved.
Hello, Chosen One. Nice to see you again. I pray that your holy quest is going well. Is there something I can help you with?
Good joke, Chosen One! You know where it is. That way -- to the south.
Go see Hakunin in the north corner of the village.  He can help you.
Chosen One, our people are dying. You must hurry your search for the holy GECK. What may I do to aid you in this most holy of quests?
Oh gods -- may the spirit of the Founder guide you. If you're the Chosen One, we're  going to need it.
They come to our village from the east, but their goods are poor.
Gods protect you on your journey.
We are running out of time, Chosen One. Please, finish your holy quest soon. We can not afford to wait much longer. If there's anythying I can do to help you to save us, let me know.

links.text: Could you tell me where the great bridge is located?
One more question, if I may.
Thank you.  Goodbye.
Could you tell me where I can find some healing herbs?
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
Never mind.
[TALK]
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
Can you tell me where I can find more healing powder?
It is good to see you, but I must be going.
Can you tell me where I can find more healing powder?
It is good to see you, but I must be going.
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
One more question, if I may.
Thank you.  Goodbye.
One more question, if I may.
Thank you.  Goodbye.
It is good to see you, but I must be going.
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
Can you tell me where I can find more healing powder?
Uun Ga.
One more question, if I may.
Could you tell me where I can find some healing herbs?
Thank you. Goodbye.
I do have a question for you.
Goodbye, my friend.
It is good to see you, but I must be going.
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
Can you tell me where I can find more healing powder?
